name: Lycanroc
author: so-taro
flavor_text: It has no problem ignoring orders it doesn’t like. It doesn’t seem to mind getting hurt at all—as long as it can finish off its opponent.

abilities.name: Boiling Blood
abilities.effect: If your opponent has any Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX in play, this Pokémon’s attacks cost {C}{C}{C} less.

attacks.name: Voltage Claw
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon has any Special Energy attached to it, this attack does 70 more damage.
